entry.title: 1.28.0-beta3
entry.content:
Notable Changes

  • Updated the GitHub package to v0.15.5
  • Added a setting for changing Atom's color profile back to sRGB
  • Fixed an issue where dashes were being prefixed with backslashes in non-regex searches
All Changes

Atom Core

v1.28.0-beta2...v1.28.0-beta3

  • atom/atom#17462 - Upgrade atom/github on Beta
  • atom/atom#17380 - Restore color rendering following Electron 2.0 update
  • atom/atom#17464 - Extend the color profile PR (#17380)

find-and-replace

v0.215.10...v0.215.11

  • atom/find-and-replace#1027 - Avoid prefixing dashes with backslashes in non-regex searches

github

v0.15.4...v0.15.5

  • atom/github#1500 - Revisit commit message processing
  • atom/github#1492 - Band-aids for focus management code
  • atom/github#1501 - Identity "large" file patches by diff byte size, not line count
  • atom/github#1508 - Re-render after closing commit message editor

entry.content:

github

v0.15.0...v0.15.4

  • atom/github#1441 - Update electron-devtools-installer to the latest version üöÄ
  • atom/github#1458 - Split GitTabController into an Item, Container, and Controller

  • atom/github#1480 - Update react-dom to the latest version üöÄ
  • atom/github#1481 - Update react to the latest version üöÄ
  • atom/github#1482 - chore(package): update sinon to version 5.0.10
  • atom/github#1483 - ID-based email avatars
  • atom/github#1488 - Never open panes while the StagingView does not have focus
  • atom/github#1489 - Bump git

Notable Changes

  • Updated the GitHub package to version 0.14.5

entry.title: 1.28.0-beta1
entry.content:
Notable Changes

Upgraded Electron from 2.0.0 to 2.0.1 to take advantage of recent security fixes and stability improvements (#17362)

All Changes

Atom Core

v1.28.0-beta0...v1.28.0-beta1

  • atom/atom#17351 - Provide more context when test fails due to timeout in waitsFor
  • atom/atom#17362 - ‚¨ÜÔ∏è electron@2.0.1

fuzzy-finder

v1.8.1...v1.8.2

  • atom/fuzzy-finder#347 - Fix flaky test re: "toggling when the project has multiple paths" ü§û

line-ending-selector

v0.7.6...v0.7.7

  • atom/line-ending-selector#57 - Fix flaky test re: "changes the line endings in the buffer" ü§û
Upgraded Electron from 1.7.11 to 1.7.15 to take advantage of recent security fixes and stability improvements (#17361)

entry.title: 1.28.0-beta0
entry.content:
Notable Changes

  • Electron has been upgraded to version 2.0.
  • Active editors are now updated when experimental Tree-sitter grammars are toggled in settings.
  • Shell environment variables are now carried into Atom when launched from PowerShell or Windows Command Prompt.
  • The Find in Project results view now groups adjacent matches and highlights multiple matches on the same line.
  • The language-html package now supports GraphQL script tags and multi-line style attributes.
  • CriticMarkup syntax is now colored correctly in Markdown files.
  • Fixed an issue where files in a Git repo might be locked or corrupted.
  • The placeholder glyph that appears when reordering tabs is now much more responsive.
All Changes

Atom Core

v1.27.0...v1.28.0-beta0

  • atom/atom#17153 - Correct Project.onDidChangeFiles documentation
  • atom/atom#17159 - Bump version for about package.
  • atom/atom#17169 - Remove FreeBSD build instructions since they don't work
  • atom/atom#17166 - Avoid writing to config file while quitting
  • atom/atom#17208 - Fix white I-beam cursor
  • atom/atom#15165 - Recognize Windows cmd or powershell environment in updateProcessEnv
  • atom/atom#17215 - :arrow_up: git-utils v5.4.0
  • atom/atom#17212 - Remove 'project' command line flag
  • atom/atom#17216 - Wait to initialize auto update manager until config is loaded
  • atom/atom#17218 - Update existing editors' language modes when toggling tree-sitter feature flag
  • atom/atom#17254 - ‚¨ÜÔ∏è electron@1.7.14
  • atom/atom#17255 - Create file recovery directory if it doesn't already exist
  • atom/atom#17263 - Fix out of date doc block method name
  • atom/atom#17273 - Upgrade to Electron 2.0.0
  • atom/atom#17303 - Update languages

one-dark-ui

v1.12.1...v1.12.3

  • atom/one-dark-ui#256 - Fix selected item not visible when using arrow up key
  • atom/one-dark-ui#259 - More sticky header fixes
  • atom/one-dark-ui#260 - Disable sticky headers by default

one-light-ui

v1.12.1...v1.12.3

  • atom/one-light-ui#132 - Fix selected item not visible when using arrow up key
  • atom/one-light-ui#133 - More sticky header fixes
  • atom/one-light-ui#134 - Disable sticky headers by default

about

v1.8.1...v1.9.1

  • atom/about#73 - update terms of service link
  • atom/about#75 - Clear status bar icon if current version is newer than cached update
  • atom/about#76 - Update Standard and üî• babel-eslint
  • atom/about#77 - Remove usage of Babel
  • atom/about#79 - Add back missing path in atom-logo

archive-view

v0.64.3...v0.64.5

  • atom/archive-view#57 - Decaffeinate package specs
  • atom/archive-view#62 - ‚¨ÜÔ∏è ls-archive@1.2.5
  • atom/archive-view#63 - Fix async timing issue in tests

autoflow

v0.29.3...v0.29.4

  • atom/autoflow#67 - Don't let special characters surpass wrapColumn

encoding-selector

v0.23.8...v0.23.9

  • atom/encoding-selector#61 - On windows, exclude encodings that don't work

find-and-replace

v0.215.9...v0.215.10

  • atom/find-and-replace#1015 - Add keymaps for home and end to project search
  • atom/find-and-replace#1002 - Refactor results-view, upgrade context lines and multi-results lines

github

v0.14.3...v0.15.0

  • atom/github#1386 - Upgrade to Enzyme 3
  • atom/github#1390 - React 16.3.1
  • atom/github#1393 - üõ†Replace uses of ObserveModelDecorator with ObserveModel
  • atom/github#1400 - Call FilePatchController methods on the "real item"
  • atom/github#1401 - DOMPurify is done within the notifications package
  • atom/github#1402 - No-op on untitled buffers
  • atom/github#1411 - Only register "github:co-author:..." commands on co-author editor
  • atom/github#1412 - Restore missing RefHolder
  • atom/github#1421 - Make ListSelections immutable
  • atom/github#1414 - Rework PaneItem management
  • atom/github#1424 - Port the StagingView to React
  • atom/github#1426 - Move Atom API bridge components to lib/atom
  • atom/github#1427 - Mass dependency upgrade
  • atom/github#798 - Diagnostic cache viewer
  • atom/github#1430 - Remove babel-eslint
  • atom/github#1428 - Upgrade Relay to 1.6.0
  • atom/github#1431 - Update dependencies to enable Greenkeeper üå¥
  • atom/github#1432 - Restore missing .get() call
  • atom/github#1433 - Pane splitting and copying
  • atom/github#1435 - Reset mouseSelectionInProgress synchronously on mouseUp
  • atom/github#1438 - Clear the branch name after a successful checkout
  • atom/github#1439 - Improve git log readability
  • atom/github#1446 - chore(package): update sinon to version 5.0.6
  • atom/github#1447 - URIPatterns never match undefined or null
  • atom/github#1448 - URIPattern.match() returns a URIMatch
  • atom/github#1449 - Prompt server updates to run under Electron 2.0
  • atom/github#1452 - Fix so dialogs are canceled when pressing escape/closing them
  • atom/github#1457 - Restore ability to commit when using Atom with Electron 2.0

tabs

v0.109.1...v0.109.2

  • atom/tabs#390 - Improve performance of placing placeholder

language-csharp

v1.0.1...v1.0.4

  • atom/language-csharp#116 - Use PCRE-compatible CSON grammar
  • atom/language-csharp#118 - Black method parameters highlighting
  • atom/language-csharp#119 - Use black color for properties

language-gfm

v0.90.3...v0.90.4

  • atom/language-gfm#229 - Fix CriticMarkup scope names

language-html

v0.49.0...v0.49.1

  • atom/language-html#191 - Adds <script type="application/graphql"> support
  • atom/language-html#200 - Support multiline style attributes

language-javascript

v0.128.5...v0.128.7

  • atom/language-javascript#542 - Allow more punctuation to precede regexes
  • atom/language-javascript#574 - add delete keyword to tree-sitter grammar

language-json

v0.19.1...v0.19.2

  • atom/language-json#61 - add Pipfile.lock files

language-sass

v0.61.4...v0.62.0

  • atom/language-sass#251 - üéÅ Add SassDoc grammar patterns

Notable Changes

  • You can now add co-authors to Git commits in the Git pane.
  • It's now easier to undo and amend your last commit in the Git pane.
  • You can now push and pull branches more easily from the status bar.
  • You can now create pull requests from the GitHub pane.
  • A closed tree view dock is no longer expanded when the 'Auto Reveal' option is enabled.
  • Clip cursor width when soft-wrap is on and cursor is at the end of a line.
  • Restore cursor position correctly after undo/redo when multiple editors are open for the same buffer.
  • Prevent default editor commands from modifying read-only TextEditors.
  • Separate the concept of "keyboard enabled" editor state from read-only editor state.
  • Ensure that files are not opened incorrectly when multiple open requests occur simultaneously.
  • Improve handling of line endings in Unicode files.
  • Fixed an issue that causes the dock handle to break when an item is dragged over it.
  • Clarify deprecation of undo: skip option.
All Changes

Atom Core

v1.26.1...v1.27.0

  • atom/atom#16999 - Prevent default commands from modifying readonly TextEditors
  • atom/atom#17041 - Add Probot lock configuration
  • atom/atom#16864 - Convert Dock class to Etch
  • atom/atom#16936 - Fix bug caused by dragging file from desktop through dock handle
  • atom/atom#17056 - Weekly Focus: 2018-04-02
  • atom/atom#17070 - Defer component initialization until element is requested
  • atom/atom#17089 - Clarify deprecation of undo: skip option
  • atom/atom#17102 - Weekly Focus: 2018-04-09
  • atom/atom#17111 - Bump github package version to 0.13.2
  • atom/atom#17126 - atom/github v0.14.0
  • atom/atom#17124 - Separate keyboard enablement from read-only editor state
  • atom/atom#17166 - Avoid writing to config file while quitting
  • atom/atom#17177 - atom/github 0.14.1
  • atom/atom#17208 - Fix white I-beam cursor
  • atom/atom#17212 - Remove 'project' command line flag
  • atom/atom#17216 - Wait to initialize auto update manager until config is loaded
  • atom/atom#17218 - Update existing editors' language modes when toggling tree-sitter feature flag

one-dark-ui

v1.11.0...v1.12.1

  • atom/one-dark-ui#248 - Fix tabs.less
  • atom/one-dark-ui#250 - Sticky header config
  • atom/one-dark-ui#252 - Fix sticky header from covering auto-revealed items
  • atom/one-dark-ui#247 - Increase contrast of scrollbar thumb
  • atom/one-dark-ui#253 - Add option for left tab close buttons
  • atom/one-dark-ui#255 - Custom GitHub package inputs

one-light-ui

v1.11.0...v1.12.1

  • atom/one-light-ui#127 - Fix active pane marker
  • atom/one-light-ui#128 - Sticky header config
  • atom/one-light-ui#129 - Fix sticky header from covering auto-revealed items
  • atom/one-light-ui#130 - Add option for left tab close buttons
  • atom/one-light-ui#131 - Custom GitHub package inputs

about

v1.8.0...v1.8.1

  • atom/about#71 - Fixing display for squirrel icon

autocomplete-plus

v2.40.5...v2.40.6

  • atom/autocomplete-plus#961 - fix using autocomplete instead of autocomplete-plus to retrieve config

bracket-matcher

v0.89.1...v0.89.2

  • atom/bracket-matcher#347 - Insert bracket pair and position cursor within a transaction
  • atom/bracket-matcher#346 - Eliminate uneccesary calls to isRangeCommentedOrString

find-and-replace

v0.215.5...v0.215.9

  • atom/find-and-replace#1006 - Explicitly wait for a non-pending item
  • atom/find-and-replace#1007 - Don't modify selection when toggling "only in selection"
  • atom/find-and-replace#1009 - Create unicode regexps when necessary
  • atom/find-and-replace#1000 - Keep collapsed items in sync with search results
  • atom/find-and-replace#1014 - Check if an active editor exists when toggling "Only in Selection"

github

v0.12.0...v0.14.3

  • atom/github#1349 - More prominent commit button
  • atom/github#1350 - :arrow_up: fs-extra
  • atom/github#1359 - Use unambiguous branch name when pushing
  • atom/github#1362 - Fix flakey GitTabController test

  • atom/github#1400 - Call FilePatchController methods on the "real item"

entry.title: 1.27.0-beta1
entry.content:
Notable Changes

  • Fixed an error that would occur when opening files from Finder on macOS.
  • Fixed a bug where Atom would auto-update even if auto-updates were disabled.
  • Fixed the cursor not turning white when using dark syntax themes.
  • Fixed an issue where packages could cause config file corruption by changing config settings during shutdown.
  • Fixed a bug in the new system for excluding scopes from spell-check.
  • Fixed an error that would occur when trying to expand snippets in the git commit message editor.

Notable Changes

  • Fixed an error that would occur when opening files from Finder on macOS.
  • Fixed a bug where Atom would auto-update even if auto-updates were disabled.
  • Fixed the cursor not turning white when using dark syntax themes.
  • Fixed an issue where packages could cause config file corruption by changing config settings during shutdown.
  • Fixed a bug in the new system for excluding scopes from spell-check.
  • Fixed an error that would occur when trying to expand snippets in the git commit message editor.

Notable Changes

  • Added experimental file system watcher support.
  • Improved support for git worktrees.
  • Updated fuzzaldrin-plus across a few packages to get better fuzzy path searching.
  • Improved file rename detection in the watchPath API.
  • Initial support for a new Atom project file format.
  • Package authors can now control the order of context menu items.
  • Chromium 56's "system-ui" generic font family is now used to load platform-specific system fonts.
  • Atom's .deb package dependencies have been expanded to enable installation inside headless environments.
  • Fixed crashes caused by missing USERNAME/USER environment variables.
  • atom --wait now works correctly with Windows file paths.
  • User interface polish around typing, scroll wheel scaling, and editor text rendering.
  • Fixed an issue where panes sometimes do not fill available space.
  • Syntax grammar updates for language-java, language-javascript, language-php, and language-yaml.
All Changes

atom-dark-ui

v0.53.1...v0.53.2

  • atom/atom-dark-ui#74 - Switch to sytem-ui font

atom-light-ui

v0.46.1...v0.46.2
